name: Gate & Heart (Part 1 of 6)
description:
The gate to the heart is not as simple as it looks. It all depends on who’s perspective the story is based on.

+++

“GATE & HEART” is a personal comic illustrated by Indasya, touching on the topic of love and how it is perceived. Love is not a straightforward path as it comes with its own obstacles. You will have to navigate through it in order to get to your beloved’s heart. This series touches lightly on the different journeys of the gate to the heart.

+++

“GATE & HEART” is a 1/1 edition exclusively on Hic Et Nunc. Grab yours now and collect all six while it lasts.
